function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Government concealing information about the outbreak","Impact":"Loss of trust, delayed response, increased spread of disease","Mitigation":"Transparent and timely communication, public health education, accountability","Technologies":"Public health surveillance systems, data analytics, social media monitoring tools","People":"Public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Ambiguity in government communication","Impact":"Confusion, misinformation, reduced compliance with preventive measures","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent messaging, public health education, media literacy programs","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, information dissemination tools, social media monitoring tools","People":"Public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of conspiracy theories and rumors","Impact":"Increased public anxiety, reduced trust in authoritative sources, hindrance to public health efforts","Mitigation":"Debunking misinformation, providing accurate information, addressing public concerns","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, social media monitoring tools, public health communication platforms","People":"Public, healthcare workers, government officials, media","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"}]}
